title: Random trinket issue.

replies.body:
This is pretty hard to speculate as I don't have much context/metadata about what OS you are on but by any chance, are you on Windows 10? Post Creators Update? 

We've had reports made by players where after this update was made to their computer, mouse bindings (MB4/MB5/Side Buttons) with League isn't working properly. If this does not apply to you, I'd recommend contacting me through a [**Tech Support Ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!

That is exactly what's happening!
Is there a hotfix or workaround to this already? Or is it still an anomaly?
Right now, there isn't a viable workaround that I can personally recommend players. The Creator Update is (arguably) recent, but  I can tell you that our teams are definitely looking into the matter.
Okay, though thank you for helping me understand what's going on at least.

If your mouse has software that lets you customize the buttons, that should work.

For example, I've got a Razer mouse, and have one of the mouse buttons mapped to z (my melee attack on Overwatch, and the chat window expand on League [which is default]).

Still working just fine for me.
